fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a project with the HTML template
2. Compile to device/simulator
3. Scroll down to a link
4. Click on the up arrow and then press back

Actual:
Nothing happens

Expected:
Should bring use back to the last location before click

Note: Last working 2.0.0.v20120321071752
fields.summary: iOS: Button: Back on local link does not work
